full_summary:
Planned Government Tender Announcement
=====================================================

### Tender Details

#### Reference Information

* **Title** (English): Employment Insurance SCBO Core Curriculum for Not-Unemployed
* **Title** (French): Programme de base de l'APSC - Assurance emploi pour les non-chômeurs
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01013994

#### Notice Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 100022388
* **Publication Date**: 2022-11-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-06T14:00:00 (already expired)
* **Related Amendment**: 1

### Technical Details

* **End-to-End Learning Services (Excludes COTS Training)**: GSN (8) U008P
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Service Delivery Information

* **Service Category**: Advisory and Support Services (SRV)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Service Delivery Regions**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Client Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Employment and Social Development Canada
* **End-User Entity**: Employment and Social Development Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Michelle Pauzé, Procurement Specialist: Michelle.Pauze@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

### Documents

* [Information Package in English (ZIP)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/21/9042d66eb383106649ef74b5895d76ff/100022388-npp.docx)
* [Information Package in French (ZIP)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/21/a7af76cb31ee27d02eeeaf83806cec47/100022388-apm.docx)

### Related Information

* The request for proposals related to the provision of end-to-end learning services is addressed to the procurement server in the country. Please refer to the attached information package for detailed requirements. Thank you.
